analysis.title: Global Market Outlook
analysis.content: Macro neutrality persists amid sector-specific alpha. The GMS 48 mandates a neutral posture as the fiscal-monetary nexus stabilizes. Credit spread compression suggests resilient solvency despite flat OGV vectors and sharp crypto sentiment contraction exposing liquidity convexity constraints. Real interest rate stability at 1.77% prevents regime degradation, while Japanese capital infusion into critical minerals offsets cyclical headwinds, reinforcing a defensive allocation within the current equilibrium. [ACTION: WAIT FOR PULLBACK]

reports.EN: Macro neutrality persists amid sector-specific alpha. The GMS 48 mandates a neutral posture as the fiscal-monetary nexus stabilizes. Credit spread compression suggests resilient solvency despite flat OGV vectors and sharp crypto sentiment contraction exposing liquidity convexity constraints. Real interest rate stability at 1.77% prevents regime degradation, while Japanese capital infusion into critical minerals offsets cyclical headwinds, reinforcing a defensive allocation within the current equilibrium. [ACTION: WAIT FOR PULLBACK]
reports.ES: Neutralidad macroeconÃ³mica persiste ante alfa sectorial. El GMS 48 dicta una postura neutral mientras el nexo fiscal-monetario se estabiliza. La compresiÃ³n de spreads de crÃ©dito sugiere solvencia resiliente, aunque la contracciÃ³n en el sentimiento cripto revela una convexidad de liquidez restringida. La estabilidad de la tasa real en 1.77% previene la degradaciÃ³n del rÃ©gimen, mientras que la inversiÃ³n japonesa en minerales crÃ­ticos compensa vientos en contra, reforzando la cautela. [ACTION: WAIT FOR PULLBACK]

reports.ID: Netralitas makro bertahan di tengah kemunculan alfa sektoral. Skor GMS 48 memandatkan postur netral seiring stabilisasi neksus fiskal-moneter. Kompresi spread kredit menunjukkan solvensi tangguh meskipun vektor OGV datar dan sentimen kripto terkontraksi tajam, yang mengekspos keterbatasan konveksitas likuiditas. Stabilitas suku bunga riil di 1.77% mencegah degradasi rezim, sementara investasi Jepang pada mineral kritis mengimbangi hambatan siklis, memperkuat alokasi defensif. [ACTION: WAIT FOR PULLBACK]

reports.DE: Makro-NeutralitÃ¤t besteht fort bei sektorspezifischem Alpha. Der GMS-Wert von 48 erzwingt eine neutrale Haltung, wÃ¤hrend sich der fiskalisch-monetÃ¤re Nexus stabilisiert. Die Kompression der Kreditspreads belegt eine robuste Solvenz, obwohl die flachen OGV-Vektoren und das sinkende Krypto-Sentiment eine eingeschrÃ¤nkte LiquiditÃ¤tskonvexitÃ¤t offenbaren. Die RealzinsstabilitÃ¤t bei 1,77 % verhindert eine Regime-Degradierung, wÃ¤hrend japanische Investitionen zyklische Gegenwinde ausgleichen. [ACTION: WAIT FOR PULLBACK]
reports.FR: La neutralitÃ© macroÃ©conomique persiste malgrÃ© l'alpha sectoriel. Le score GMS de 48 impose une posture neutre alors que le nexus fiscalo-monÃ©taire se stabilise. La compression des spreads de crÃ©dit suggÃ¨re une solvabilitÃ© rÃ©siliente malgrÃ© la stagnation des vecteurs OGV. La contraction du sentiment crypto expose une convexitÃ© de liquiditÃ© restreinte, mais la stabilitÃ© du taux rÃ©el Ã  1,77 % prÃ©vient la dÃ©gradation du rÃ©gime. L'investissement japonais compense les vents contraires cycliques. [ACTION: WAIT FOR PULLBACK]
